ARABIC: وَأَنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٌ لَّا رَيْبَ فِيهَا وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبْعَثُ مَن فِى ٱلْقُبُورِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and the Hour is coming without any doubt and Allah will raise up all those in the graves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The Hour will come without a doubt, and God will raise those who are dead.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (all of which shows that) the Hour shall surely come to pass - in this there is no doubt - and Allah shall surely resurrect those that are in graves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: There is no doubt about the coming of the Hour of Doom and that God will raise every one from their graves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And because the Last Day will come, there is no doubt in it – and because Allah will revive those who are in the graves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And surely, the Hour is coming, there is no doubt about it; and certainly, Allah will resurrect those who are in the graves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And because the hour is coming, there is no doubt about it; and because Allah shall raise up those who are in the graves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and because the Hour is coming, no doubt of it, and God shall raise up whosoever is within the tombs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And because the Hour will come, there is no doubt thereof; and because Allah will raise those who are in the graves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The Last Hour is bound to come. There is no doubt about it. God will raise up those who are in their graves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And because the Hour is coming- there is no doubt thereof-- and because Allah will raise up those who are in the graves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and because the Hour is bound to come, there is no doubt in it, and Allah will resurrect those who are in the graves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And verily the Hour will come: there can be no doubt about it, or about (the fact) that Allah will raise up all who are in the graves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And surely, the Hour is coming, there is no doubt about it, and certainly, Allah will resurrect those who are in the graves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And the Hour is sure to come there is no doubt. And Allah will raise up those in the graves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And because the Hour is coming—there is no doubt about it—and because God will resurrect those in the graves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [that they may know] that the Hour is coming - no doubt about it - and that Allah will resurrect those in the graves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [22:7] and because the Hour will come, whereof there is no doubt, uncertainty; and because God will resurrect those who are in the graves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And because the Hour will come, there is no doubt thereof) there is no doubt that it will come; (and because Allah will raise those who are in the graves) for requital and chastisement.
